meanings.definition: Aminopyrines: a group of drugs used to relieve pain and reduce fever.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed aminopyrines to help with my headache.
meanings.sent2: Aminopyrines are commonly used to lower body temperature during a fever.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook aminopyrines for candy and tried to eat them!
meanings.sent4: The aminopyrines acted like little warriors fighting against my pain and fever.
meanings.sent5: The image of aminopyrines as tiny superheroes battling illness stuck in my mind.
